general.no-burn-items: You don't have any items to burn yet.

wallet.title: Connect Wallet
wallet.welcomeMessage: Connect with one of our available wallet providers

signing.title: CONFIRM TRANSACTION IN YOUR CONNECTED WALLET
signing.description: Processing the transaction will take a short while. If you want to cancel this operation, please decline the transaction in your wallet app.

minting.title: WRITING TO CHAIN
minting.description: Hold on. Your transaction will be validated shortly.

approving.title: APPROVING
approving.description: Approving your asset to be staked. If you want to cancel this operation, please decline the transaction in your wallet app.

nonce.title: FETCHING SIGNATURE
nonce.description: Fetching signature for your claim. Please wait a few seconds.

second-transaction.title: WAIT FOR SECOND TRANSACTION
second-transaction.description: You need to wait for the second transaction to claim your Avatar. This can take up to 1 minute!

tips.title: GAMEBOOK
tips.subtitle: AOC Catalogue No. 723
tips.description: If you feel lost in space, make sure to read Planet IX’s Gamebook.

tips.title: LEGENDARY ASSETS
tips.subtitle: AOC Catalogue No. 954
tips.description: Most assets vary in tier and rarity, with Legendary assets being the most valuable.

tips.title: SEASONS
tips.subtitle: AOC Catalogue No. 341
tips.description: As more Waste is gathered and processed on Planet IX, the planet’s climate will stabilize and new missions will emerge.

tips.title: AGENT OF CHANGE
tips.subtitle: AOC Catalogue No. 629
tips.description: As an Agent of Change, your mission is to resurrect Planet IX.

tips.title: NETEMPIRE MARKETPLACE
tips.subtitle: AOC Catalogue No. 683
tips.description: By listing your PIX and other assets in the Marketplace, you can make it easier for potential buyers to find and purchase them.

tips.title: AFTER EARTH
tips.subtitle: AOC Catalogue No. 583
tips.description: The Earth ended in the year 2089 A.C. This same year became 1 A.E.

tips.title: TILE CONTRACTS
tips.subtitle: AOC Catalogue No. 298
tips.description: All Tile Contracts have unique qualities, with most giving additional benefits to harvesting vehicles and facilities.

tips.title: territoRIES
tips.subtitle: AOC Catalogue No. 271
tips.description: You can combine adjacent PIX to create territories. Therefore, you should focus on small parts of the map by selling and buying the right ones.

tips.title: ARCHIVES
tips.subtitle: AOC Catalogue No. 577
tips.description: When the Agents of Change returned in the year 450 A.E., remnants of humanity had survived the Ending, scattered among planets and moons in the solar system.

tips.title: IX FOUNDATION
tips.subtitle: AOC Catalogue No. 478
tips.description: Staking Landmarks, Territories and MetaShares ON IX Foundation is a great way to secure a continuous flow of $IXT.

tips.title: ARCHIVES
tips.subtitle: AOC Catalogue No. 123
tips.description: The inventor of A.M.E was named Ame Valdis, and her sister, Agnes Valdis, recorded data logs of their upbringing and demise. Some of the records are still hidden on Planet IX.

tips.title: rovers
tips.subtitle: AOC Catalogue No. 137
tips.description: Rovers only need to be emptied once every ten days.

tips.title: rovers
tips.subtitle: AOC Catalogue No. 739
tips.description: Rovers may discover M3ta-M0ds.

tips.title: ROVERS & DRONES
tips.subtitle: AOC Catalogue No. 157
tips.description: Rovers and Drones can be placed on the same Land Tile in Mission Control. If they are of the same tier, the Drone’s performance will increase by an additional 20%.

tips.title: DRONES
tips.subtitle: AOC Catalogue No. 866
tips.description: Rovers may require repairs at times, while Drones are known to neverbreak down.

tips.title: PIX
tips.subtitle: AOC Catalogue No. 324
tips.description: Planet IX is a digital rendition of Earth, where all land is divided into 1.7 billion PIX, each being a unique NFT.

tips.title: ENERGY
tips.subtitle: AOC Catalogue No. 429
tips.description: Staking a Facility on a Territoryinstead of a PIX will result in higher Energy yield.

tips.title: LANDMARKS
tips.subtitle: AOC Catalogue No. 726
tips.description: Each landmark is assigned a rarity tier and star rating based on its strategic importance in the Planet IX universe.

tips.title: LANDMARKS
tips.subtitle: AOC Catalogue No. 727
tips.description: Every Landmark has an area of commission, and those who own and stake the Landmark receive a 5% commission on the value of every trade conducted within this area.

tips.title: metashares
tips.subtitle: AOC Catalogue No. 1328
tips.description: MetaShare owners are continuously rewarded with $IXT. The amount distributed from the corporation’s treasury depends on the corporation's monthly revenue.

tips.title: RAFFLES
tips.subtitle: AOC Catalogue No. 196
tips.description: If you have any extra Raffle Tickets, be sure to visit Lucky Cat and participate in the upcoming Raffle.

tips.title: M3TA-m0ds
tips.subtitle: AOC Catalogue No. 659
tips.description: M3ta-M0ds can be utilized to upgrade Facilities.

tips.title: tile contracts
tips.subtitle: AOC Catalogue No. 213
tips.description: Tile Contracts can be bought at Newlands LLC. Once you have claimed and staked a Tile Contract, extra Land Tiles will be available in Mission Control.

tips.title: AStro gold
tips.subtitle: AOC Catalogue No. 258
tips.description: Activating an additional Land Tile incurs a monthly cost of 1 Astro Gold or 1 Astro Gold Lite.

tips.title: tile contracts
tips.subtitle: AOC Catalogue No. 586
tips.description: You can activate and deactivate Land Tiles in Mission Control.

tips.title: web3 wallet
tips.subtitle: AOC Catalogue No. 330
tips.description: If this Loading Screen seems stuck, try using the Speed Up-function in your Web3 wallet.

tips.title: ARCHIVES
tips.subtitle: AOC Catalogue No. 986
tips.description: The Chasse-Galerie was the last space vessel to reach the surface of Planet IX after the Ending. The majority of the ship’s data logs arestill missing.

tips.title: PROXY OF CHANGE
tips.subtitle: AOC Catalogue No. 569
tips.description: Proxies of Change are neither humans nor robots; they are an unknown life-form created by A.M.E.

tips.title: ARCHIVES
tips.subtitle: AOC Catalogue No. 410
tips.description: Proxies of Change are neither humans nor robots; they are an unknown life-form created by A.M.E.

tips.title: ARCHIVES
tips.subtitle: AOC Catalogue No. 1792
tips.description: AFTER the Ending, trade between inner planets and outer satellites was crucial for humanity’s survival. With no regulatory body governing commerce, corporations became the solar system’s statelike entities.

tips.title: THE ENDING
tips.subtitle: AOC Catalogue No. 5123
tips.description: The final stage of the Ending was the NeoVirus,a COMPUTER virus specifically designed to achieve one objective - the complete annihilationof civilisation.

tips.title: pix & LAND TILES
tips.subtitle: AOC Catalogue No. 102
tips.description: The digital plots of land on Planet IX are called PIX, which can be staked on Land Tiles in Mission Control.

tips.title: territoRIES
tips.subtitle: AOC Catalogue No. 850
tips.description: Outlier Areas are created in the NetEmpire Marketplace by connecting 10 or more adjacent outlier PIX.

tips.title: territoRIES
tips.subtitle: AOC Catalogue No. 851
tips.description: Most assets vary in tier and rarity, with Legendary assets being the most valuable.

tips.title: territoRIES
tips.subtitle: AOC Catalogue No. 852
tips.description: Uncommon Areas are created in the NetEmpire Marketplace by connecting 30 or more adjacent uncommon PIX.

tips.title: territoRIES
tips.subtitle: AOC Catalogue No. 853
tips.description: Rare Areas are created in the NetEmpire Marketplace by connecting 40 or more adjacent rare PIX.

tips.title: territoRIES
tips.subtitle: AOC Catalogue No. 854
tips.description: Legendary Areas are created in the NetEmpire Marketplace by connecting 50 or more adjacent legendary PIX.

tips.title: FACILITIES
tips.subtitle: AOC Catalogue No. 1023
tips.description: You can upgrade Facilities at Newlands LLC. When you do, they become twice as good.

tips.title: drones
tips.subtitle: AOC Catalogue No. 423
tips.description: Drones collect Waste over a 48-hour period.

tips.title: NEWLANDS GENESIS
tips.subtitle: AOC Catalogue No. 419
tips.description: By staking the Newlands Genesis, you'll gain free access to extra Land Tiles.

tips.title: y_ GENESIS
tips.subtitle: AOC Catalogue No. 421
tips.description: Staking the Y_ Genesis grants you free repairs for Rovers.

tips.title: eternalab GENESIS
tips.subtitle: AOC Catalogue No. 425
tips.description: Staking the Eternalab Genesis boosts the likelihood of successful outcomes in Waste Refining Experiments.

tips.title: AIRDROPS
tips.subtitle: AOC Catalogue No. 843
tips.description: If you carry the AOC Gold Badge, you will be added to the whitelist for future airdrops.

transfer.title: Transfer Asset
transfer.warningText:
Make sure the adress is correct!

There is no way to reverse this transaction
transfer.verifyText: I Verify that this is the correct adress
